name: Toy Car Drifting
description:
Toy Car Drifting offers you the freedom to customize your car's visuals and performance to your liking, and take your Toy Car Drifting!

DRIFTING
You have 3 minutes on each track and you recieve combos and earn points depending on your speed and your style. By the end of each round you get money according to your performance.

CARS
You can select from 6 unique cars, and fully customize them to your liking!

TRACKS
You unlock the next track by beating the target score on the first which is 50.000 on each track. You can select from 8 amazing tracks, which are all fun.

VISUAL CUSTOMIZATION
-Front Bumpers
-Real Bumpers
-Exhausts
-Spoilers
-Rims
-18 colors for Cars and Rims

PERFORMANCE UPGRADE
You have 3 stages to upgrade you Toy Car's:
-Suspension
-Weight
-Engine
-ECU
Each upgrade makes your car's drifting abilities better.
